<small>Also see: **<big>[[H8205|שְׁפִי]]</big>**</small>

 I. [<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שָׁפָה‎</span>] **verb** ==sweep bare== (Arabic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> (<img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">), of wind, ***raise and carry off*** dust, <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> of horse, ***scanty*** in hair of forelock; Late Hebrew Pi\`el ***plane off***; Aramaic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> Passive participle ***level*** ([[Isa.40.4|Isa 40:4]] = <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מִישׁוֺר‎</span>), ***smooth, limpid***, <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***make level, smooth*** (and derivatives)); — 

**Niph\`al** ***be wind-swept, bare; Participle*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הַרנִֿשְׁפֶּה‎</span> [[Isa.13.2|Isa 13:2]] ***a bare mountain***; **Pu\`al** ***Perfect*** consecutive <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וְשֻׁפוּ עַצְמֹתָיו‎</span> [[Job.33.21|Job 33:21]] [[BDB#Qr|Qr]] ***his bones are laid bare*** (so lean is he; [[BDB#Kt|Kt]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וּשְׁפִי‎</span> ***bareness*** are his bones).
